wikipedia_page.main: Francesca Snell, also known as Francesca Painter-Snell, (born 28 March 1987) is a New Zealand and British water polo player. She competed for the New Zealand women's national water polo team at the 2007 World Aquatics Championships and for Great Britain in the women's tournament at the 2012 Summer Olympics. This was the first ever Olympic GB women's water polo team.She is a member of the West London Penguin Swimming and Water Polo Club.

link_mentions.page: West London Penguin Swimming and Water Polo Club
response: The club has a number of water polo teams, with the competition level teams participating at the highest level in the British Water Polo League (Men and Women categories). Club member Francesca Snell was selected to the Great Britain Olympic Water Polo team for the London 2012 Olympic Games.
* Francesca Snell, Water Polo - Summer Olympics 2012
